name: Wretched
summary: Get the first version of this Horror Game. Immerse yourself in the chilling depths of Wretched, a virtual reality game that combines the intense suspense of horror with the action-packed thrill of a shooter. As you step into the twisted realm of this blood-soaked, shattered hospital, you find yourself confined to a platform, unable to escape the encroaching nightmare. Armed with a trusty flashlight and a pistol, it's up to you to...
